name: Hidden Object Adventures Queen Elves Free
name_original: Hidden Object Adventures Queen Elves Free
description:
The queen of the Elves went mad and started destroying everything on her way , winning a settlement with the help of the army. You need to stop it! It will not be so easy, she had a strong army. You need to win the conquered settlements step-by-step. You need to change your strategy, luring her into a trap, or cheat in the battle, or intimidate her army. It's up to you!

The game has 20 levels in which you need to show the ability of mindfulness, agility, fast thinking, and precision of your actions.

1. You need to find the hidden objects that are not easy to find, be careful.

2. It is necessary to solve the puzzle and clear the path before the main enchanted stone is put him in a cell

3. To demonstrate the quality in the shooting accuracy and clear the board from the eleven enchanted queen spheres, getting right on target.

Be sure and the victory will be yours!

FEATURES:
-Look for Hidden Objects!
-Engaging storyline and mysterious plot!
-Hundreds of items to find!
-Hints available if you get stuck!
-Includes various bonus minigames!
